resources.string: Click this message for more info.

We think you are close to %1$s, but we are not able to tell if you have actually reached that location. (Sorry, this situation occurs from time to time due to current limitations with location-based technology.)\n\nIf you have actually reached %2$s, click the button below to send the notification.

Your phone\'s location reporting setting has been turned off, and it must be on in order to use POM. POM is now disabled, meaning notifications will not be sent/received. You can re-enable location reporting in POM after you turn your phone\'s location reporting setting back on.
Your phone\'s location reporting setting is not turned on, and it must be on in order to use POM.
You cannot enable location reporting until you have at least one saved location.
Sync locations between the cloud and this device
Add, edit, and remove saved locations
